defaultCourses.title: Introduction to Web Development
defaultCourses.description:
Learn the fundamentals of web development including HTML, CSS, and basic JavaScript.
Build your first static website.

materials.title: HTML Cheat Sheet
materials.description: Quick reference for common HTML tags.

materials.title: CSS Explained in 10 Minutes
materials.description: A quick visual overview of CSS concepts.

defaultCourses.title: Advanced CSS Techniques
defaultCourses.description:
Master modern CSS features like Flexbox, Grid, custom properties, and animations.
Create complex and responsive layouts.

defaultCourses.title: JavaScript Data Structures & Algorithms
defaultCourses.description:
Deep dive into common data structures (Arrays, Linked Lists, Trees, Graphs) and algorithms using JavaScript.
Essential for interviews.

defaultCourses.title: Creative Writing Workshop
defaultCourses.description:
Explore storytelling techniques, character development, plot structure, and find your unique writing voice.
Includes peer reviews and weekly prompts.

defaultCourses.title: Python for Absolute Beginners
defaultCourses.description:
Start your programming journey with Python. Covers syntax, data types, control flow, and basic problem-solving.
No prior experience needed!

materials.title: Official Python Tutorial
materials.description: The official documentation is a great resource.

materials.title: Setup Reminder
materials.description: Remember to install Python 3.x from python.org and choose a code editor like VS Code!

defaultCourses.title: Introduction to Data Analysis with Pandas
defaultCourses.description:
Learn how to clean, manipulate, analyze, and visualize data using the powerful Python Pandas library.
Uses real-world datasets.

defaultCourses.title: Digital Photography Fundamentals
defaultCourses.description: Understand your camera settings (aperture, shutter speed, ISO), composition rules, and basic photo editing using popular software.

defaultCourses.title: Advanced JavaScript Concepts
defaultCourses.description:
Master tricky JS concepts like closures, prototypes, promises, async/await, and the event loop.
Prepare for senior roles.

defaultCourses.title: Graphic Design Principles
defaultCourses.description:
Learn the basics of graphic design including color theory, typography, layout, and visual hierarchy.
Build a small portfolio.

defaultCourses.title: Public Speaking Masterclass
defaultCourses.description:
Build confidence and deliver compelling presentations. Covers structuring speeches, body language, and handling nerves.
Practice sessions included.

defaultCourses.title: React Framework Fundamentals
defaultCourses.description:
Build dynamic user interfaces with React. Learn about components, state, props, hooks, and the virtual DOM.
Create several small projects.

defaultCourses.title: Node.js Backend Development with Express
defaultCourses.description: Learn to build scalable RESTful APIs using Node.js and the Express framework. Covers routing, middleware, and database integration basics.

defaultCourses.title: Introduction to Machine Learning Concepts
defaultCourses.description:
Understand the basic concepts of machine learning, types of algorithms (supervised, unsupervised), and common use cases.
Theoretical focus.

defaultCourses.title: Beginner's Guide to Watercolor Painting
defaultCourses.description:
Discover the joy of watercolors. Learn basic techniques like washes, layering, and color mixing.
Relax and create beautiful art.

defaultCourses.title: Mindfulness Meditation for Stress Reduction
defaultCourses.description:
Learn practical mindfulness and meditation techniques to reduce stress, improve focus, and enhance well-being.
Guided sessions provided.

defaultCourses.title: Excel for Power Users
defaultCourses.description:
Go beyond the basics. Master advanced formulas, PivotTables, data validation, and automate tasks with macros.
Boost your productivity.

defaultCourses.title: Mobile App Design (UI/UX)
defaultCourses.description:
Learn the principles of designing intuitive and engaging user interfaces and experiences for mobile applications.
Focus on user-centered design.

defaultCourses.title: Web Scraping with Python (Beautiful Soup & Scrapy)
defaultCourses.description:
Learn how to extract data from websites automatically using Python libraries like Beautiful Soup and Scrapy.
Handle dynamic content.

defaultCourses.title: Advanced React Patterns
defaultCourses.description:
Explore advanced React concepts like Higher-Order Components (HOCs), Render Props, Context API, and performance optimization.
For experienced React devs.

defaultCourses.title: Yoga for Beginners: Improve Flexibility
defaultCourses.description:
A gentle introduction to Yoga focusing on poses that improve flexibility, balance, and relaxation.
Suitable for all fitness levels.

materials.title: Guided Relaxation (10 min)
materials.description: Follow along with this short relaxation video.
